name: BeautifulPiano
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beautiful piano
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Welcome to Beautiful Piano!! Relaxing, beautiful original piano music to help you enjoy your evening and spend time with your emotions. All recordings made by Spirit Tools' in-house recording studio, Studio Nän (nayantaraj.com). 

You can say play and stop. You can pause, resume, start over. You can use next and previous to get back and forth. You can shuffle and loop. 

This skill offers premium content, in the form of a one-time purchase of a Christmas piano music pack. 

If you have any feedback, comments or questions, we'd love to hear from you! Please email us at nayantara.music@gmail.com! :)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
